name: ClearBoost: Enhanced Video Reception for Drones and FPV
blurb: A small device that sits between your video antenna and receiver to increase your video quality. Fly with less static and better video!

name: Save the Airplane that Led the D-Day Invasion
blurb: ***PLEDGES NOW COUNT DOUBLE!*** Help us complete the restoration of "That's All, Brother," the aircraft that led the D-Day invasion.

name: X PlusOne: Your Ultimate Hover + Speed Aerial Camera Drone
blurb: The X PlusOne is a revolutionary hybrid drone that combines the ability for both stabilized hover and remarkably fast forward flight.

name: tobyrich.vegas: Video Gaming meets Drones!
blurb: The world´s first smartphone controlled gaming drone for single & multiplayer dogfights, air races & stunts.

name: C-mi: The First All-in-One Camera Drone by Rocket Scientists
blurb: We develop innovative aerial devices to capture your world with a touch of a button.

name: Krossblade SkyProwler VTOL Transformer UAV
blurb: Pro-grade transformer UAV for fast and efficient fixed wing cruise and vertical take-off and landing. Cargo delivery and drop. 4K Cam.

name: PowerUp 3.0 - Smartphone Controlled Paper Airplane
blurb: PowerUp 3.0 turns your self-made paper airplane into a smartphone-controlled flying machine

name: CyPhy LVL 1 Drone: Reinvented for Performance and Control
blurb: From iRobot cofounder Helen Greiner, the first drone for everyone. It's safe, shoots films, and snaps beautiful pictures.

name: Splash Drone a Waterproof Drone with Autonomous Features
blurb: Splash Drone a waterproof drone with live video feed, payload release mechanism, emergency flare system and camera stabilization gimbal

name: World's First Solar Powered Airplane STEM Kit for Kids!
blurb: The Volta Flyer is a DIY, Maker, STEM Kit using Advanced Solar and Ultralight Materials-includes everything to build your own airplane!

name: WaterStrider: Perfect Footage. Confident Landings. Anywhere.
blurb: Convert your drone into an all-terrain vehicle. Water, snow, rocks, sand, and other rugged terrain are no match for WaterStrider™.

name: FlightBox ADS-B Receiver Kit
blurb: In-flight weather, traffic, and GPS navigation for the price of a tank of avgas.

name: Trailblazing Women Pilots – Honoring the WASP
blurb: Help us restore the airplane that gave women wings, and inspire young people with the story of America’s first female military pilots.

name: SPRY: A waterproof drone that submerges under water & flies
blurb: Spry can briefly submerge under water, float like a boat and fly in the air at over 40mph. It's very easy to fly and super strong.

name: Zing - Drone Deliveries Using DJI Drones
blurb: Drone deliveries are quick, convenient, and eco-friendly. We're making them accessible to everyone.

name: NOVA Drone: Capture 4k60 Cinematic FPV - Under 250 grams
blurb: Capture your adventure and unleash your creativity using built-in 4K 60FPS camera and dynamic movements.

name: VISTA Drone: Capture fully integrated 360-degree footage
blurb: 360-degree camera | Real-time stitching | Autonomous navigation | Easy-to-use controller | ‘Follow Me’ GPS
